member.name: SPC_INDIRECT_DATA_CONTENT
member.summary: The SPC_INDIRECT_DATA_CONTENT structure is used in Authenticode signatures to store the digest and other attributes of the signed file.

member.name: SPC_INDIRECT_DATA_CONTENT.Data
member.summary: A that contains attributes of the digested file.

member.name: SPC_INDIRECT_DATA_CONTENT.DigestAlgorithm
member.summary: Specifies the digest algorithm used to hash the file.

member.name: SPC_INDIRECT_DATA_CONTENT.Digest
member.summary: The Authenticode digest value of the file using the algorithm specified in the DigestAlgorithm parameter.
